faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about sessions, equipment and delivery.

q1.question: How long does a standard shoot take?
q1.answer: Most portrait or content sessions take 1.5–2 hours including setup, styling and lighting. Production packages vary depending on complexity.

q2.question: Do you provide equipment and studio?
q2.answer: Yes. We have a fully-equipped studio with professional lighting, backgrounds and grip. Outdoor on-location equipment is available as well.

q3.question: How and when will I receive the photos/videos?
q3.answer: Sneak peeks are usually delivered within 24 h. Full post-processed content is delivered in 3–7 days via an online gallery or drive link.

q4.question: Can I reschedule my booking?
q4.answer: Absolutely. You can reschedule up to 24 hours before your session without extra fees.
